mapper.insert: insert into tp_question_config_detail(category_id, learn_num, create_time, update_time) values(#{categoryId}, #{learnNum}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: select cfg.id id, c.id category_id, c.name categoryName, q.cnt question_num, cfg.learn_num, cfg.create_time, cfg.update_time from tp_category c left join (select category_id, count(0) cnt from tp_question group by category_id) q on c.id = q.category_id left join tp_question_config_detail cfg on c.id = cfg.category_id where c.type = 'QUESTION'
